analysis.description:
E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#541-589) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _toks == 0
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#541-589):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#562)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#576-577)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#578-589)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderAccounts (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#582)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol)
	- holderAccounts (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol)

E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#541-589) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#576-577)

Reentrancy in E4Lava.optInFromClassic (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#541-589):
	External calls:
	- _toks = iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#562)
	- iclassic.transferFrom.gas(optInXferGas)(nrequester,oldE4RecycleBin,_toks) (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#576-577)
	- iclassic.balanceOf(nrequester) == 0 (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#578-589)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- holderIndexes (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#582)
	- numAccounts (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#582)
	- numToksSwitchedOver (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol)
E4Lava.vestTime should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x86ca189a5e189513b52c2018ca9e4918cffeb54b.sol#173-174)
